title: Ontario Schools Cricket Association Essay Winner
description: I won an essay competition held by the Ontario Schools Cricket Association, where I wrote about how cricket encourages teamwork, leadership, and community in Canada. The experience helped me grow as a writer and learn more about cricket.

title: Highest Academic Award (96.3%)
description: I was honoured to receive my schoolâ€™s highest academic award with a 96.3% average, the result of steady effort and support from great teachers and peers. The journey taught me the value of consistency, curiosity, and using challenges as a chance to improve.

title: NCRTA Badminton Tournament Winner
description: Winning the NCRTA Badminton Tournament was a pleasing experience and came after lots of practice and learning from mistakes. it taught me the improtance of hard work, perseverance, and collaboration through clear communication.

title: Leadership in STEM Training
description: Participating in a Leadership in STEM course at Carleton University opened my eyes to the real problem-solving process that many engineers use. I worked with other students passionate about STEM while building some cool projects.
